- make sure you have deployed /cms/xinha/xinha/plugins/InsertYoutube folder on your server (together with all js/html/img files)

- define following xinha fields (/hippo:namespaces/hippostd/html/editor:templates/_default_/root)
    * InsertYoutube (Xinha.plugins)
    * insertyoutube (Xinha.config.toolbar)
